channel.title: Sports on Robert Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Sports on Robert Huang

item.title: The Coaching Carousel
item.description: Being a head coach or manager of a sports team must be among the world’s most unstable professions given the number of teams that go through coaching changes in a season. Whether it’s an impatient front office, angry fanbase, or ambitious coach chasing a better situation, a lot of turnover is expected in this line of work. We’ll look at exactly how volatile this job is by analyzing some of America’s most popular sports leagues â€” the NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, and WNBA.
